reviewtext: I bought this keyboard a couple of weeks ago and I have no regrets.  The  hot keys are great for internet surfing and for listening to media files  such as Winamp.  I also plugged my Intellimouse Optical into the USB ports  in the back and did not have to use a valuable USB port in the back of my  machine.  I would suggest this keyboard to anyone who likes the ergonomic  feel and who spends a lot of time on the internet and listening to or  watching media.
